title: #488: The Bush Global Satanic Death Cult Of 9/11 with William Ramsey
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome back returning champion and author William Ramsey to discuss how Aleister Crowley inspired the Global Death Cult behind the Occult Ritual of 9/11! Thank you for your support.

See Sam Tripoli Live- Tickets available at Samtripoli.com:

https://www.thecomedyclubkc.com/shows/142801

https://www.ticketcity.com/nebraska-tickets/the-waiting-room-ne-tickets/tin-foil-hat-comedy-sep-18-2021-3588045.html

https://www.eventbrite.com/e/sam-tripolis-disobey-crushfest-live-in-salt-lake-city-tickets-167982220343

Dec 10th: Tampa Bay, FL- Tin Foil Hat Comedy Live at The Sidesplitters at 10pm
https://sidesplitterscomedy.laughstub.com/event.cfm?showTimingID=545512
